URL PHISHING MALWARE DETECTION SYSTEM

The internet has become an integral part of modern society and provides numerous benefits such as information access and communication. However, it also poses significant cybersecurity risks. To address the growing threat of phishing attacks, URL Phishing Malware Detection System analyzes URL features to distinguish between legitimate websites and malicious phishing sites, to enhance cybersecurity measures using Multinomial Na√Øve Bayes and Logistics Regression.
